name: PERSON
description: Defines permissions available on a Person entity

READ.label: READ
READ.description: Grants permission to READ a PERSON

UPDATE.label: UPDATE
UPDATE.description: Grants permission to UPDATE a PERSON

name: WIDGET
description: Widget that we want to track in our system

READ.label: READ
READ.description: Grants permission to READ a WIDGET

UPDATE.label: UPDATE
UPDATE.description: Grants permission to UPDATE a WIDGET
